lines.text: In about two minutes, a bouncer is coming back in here with no sense of humor. He's a foot bigger than you in all directions. That's what I think.

[Still suffering from amnesia]
For all I know that's the first tree I ever saw; still, that's what it is; that's what they call it.

[after not responding to Phyllis' long kiss]
Did you have fun?
I've had more fun drinking a Bromo-Seltzer.
How does the inside of your mouth feel?
Like it's full of raw hamburger.
That's just what it looked like. What did they hit you with?
he will not molest you. A mere figure of speech; my word is worthless.
What about that beating I took?
I wish with all my heart that I could take it back.
Another figure of speech. You haven't got a heart.
True; but I have a brain and it was stupid of me. I apologize.
